column1: What seems to be the problem?
All right, let's see here.  Oh my God!!
Why, there's a huge crack goin' right down the middle!
All right, let's take a look.
Well the prostate seems to be normal. No swelling of the hemorrhoidal gland...
I've never quite seen this before, uh... Perhaps he just needs some hemorrhoid cream.
I've never seen a hemorrhoid react this way.
